sqlMap.sql: select u.FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_ID, u.FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.STOREOUT_STORE_ID, u.STOREOUT_STORE_NO, u.STOREOUT_STORE_NAME, u.BUSS_PSON_ID, u.BUSS_PSON_NAME, u.BUSS_DEPT_ID, u.BUSS_DEPT_NAME, u.STATE, u.REMARK, u.CREATOR, u.CRE_NAME, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPDATOR, u.UPD_NAME, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.DEL_FLAG from DRP_FEW_STOREOUT_REQ u
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt FROM DRP_FEW_STOREOUT_REQ u
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_FEW_STOREOUT_REQ( FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_ID, FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_NO, BILL_TYPE, STOREOUT_STORE_ID, STOREOUT_STORE_NO, STOREOUT_STORE_NAME, BUSS_PSON_ID, BUSS_PSON_NAME, BUSS_DEPT_ID, BUSS_DEPT_NAME, STATE, REMARK, CREATOR, CRE_NAME, CRE_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, DEL_FLAG )values( #FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_ID#, #FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_NO#, #BILL_TYPE#, #STOREOUT_STORE_ID#, #STOREOUT_STORE_NO#, #STOREOUT_STORE_NAME#, #BUSS_PSON_ID#, #BUSS_PSON_NAME#, #BUSS_DEPT_ID#, #BUSS_DEPT_NAME#, #STATE#, #REMARK#, #CREATOR#, #CRE_NAME#, sysdate, #DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME#, #DEL_FLAG# )
sqlMap.update:
update DRP_FEW_STOREOUT_REQ
STOREOUT_STORE_ID = #STOREOUT_STORE_ID# STOREOUT_STORE_NO = #STOREOUT_STORE_NO# STOREOUT_STORE_NAME = #STOREOUT_STORE_NAME# BUSS_PSON_ID = #BUSS_PSON_ID# BUSS_PSON_NAME = #BUSS_PSON_NAME# BUSS_DEPT_ID = #BUSS_DEPT_ID# BUSS_DEPT_NAME = #BUSS_DEPT_NAME# REMARK = #REMARK# STATE = #STATE# UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# UPD_TIME = sysdate
where FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_ID = #FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update DRP_FEW_STOREOUT_REQ set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# ,UPD_NAME=#UPD_NAME# ,UPDATOR=#UPDATOR# ,UPD_TIME=sysdate where FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_ID = #FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select u.FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_ID, u.FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.STOREOUT_STORE_ID, u.STOREOUT_STORE_NO, u.STOREOUT_STORE_NAME, u.BUSS_PSON_ID, u.BUSS_PSON_NAME, u.BUSS_DEPT_ID, u.BUSS_DEPT_NAME, u.STATE, u.REMARK, u.CREATOR, u.CRE_NAME, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPDATOR, u.UPD_NAME, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.DEL_FLAG from DRP_FEW_STOREOUT_REQ u where u.FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_ID = #FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_ID#
sqlMap.sql: select u.FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_DTL_ID, u.FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_ID, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.BRAND, u.STD_UNIT, u.NOTICE_NUM, u.SPCL_TECH_ID, u.REMARK, u.DEL_FLAG, a.DM_SPCL_TECH_NO, a.SPCL_SPEC_REMARK, a.SPCL_TECH_FLAG from DRP_FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_DTL u left join DRP_SPCL_TECH a on a.SPCL_TECH_ID=u.SPCL_TECH_ID and a.USE_FLAG=1
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_DTL( FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_DTL_ID, FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_ID, PRD_ID, PRD_NO, PRD_NAME, PRD_SPEC, BRAND, STD_UNIT, NOTICE_NUM, SPCL_TECH_ID, REMARK, DEL_FLAG )values( #FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_DTL_ID#, #FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_ID#, #PRD_ID#, #PRD_NO#, #PRD_NAME#, #PRD_SPEC#, #BRAND#, #STD_UNIT#, #NOTICE_NUM#, #SPCL_TECH_ID#, #REMARK#, #DEL_FLAG# )
sqlMap.update:
update DRP_FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_DTL
PRD_ID = #PRD_ID# PRD_NO = #PRD_NO# PRD_NAME = #PRD_NAME# PRD_SPEC = #PRD_SPEC# PRD_COLOR = #PRD_COLOR# BRAND = #BRAND# STD_UNIT = #STD_UNIT# NOTICE_NUM = #NOTICE_NUM# SPCL_TECH_ID = #SPCL_TECH_ID# REMARK = #REMARK#
where FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_DTL_ID = #FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_DTL_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update DRP_FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_DTL_ID in ($FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_DTL_IDS$)
update DRP_FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_ID = #FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into Drp_Storeout( STOREOUT_ID, STOREOUT_NO, BILL_TYPE, FROM_BILL_ID, FROM_BILL_NO, STOREOUT_STORE_ID, STOREOUT_STORE_NO, STOREOUT_STORE_NAME, SALE_PSON_ID, SALE_PSON_NAME, REMARK, CREATOR, CRE_NAME, CRE_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, STATE, DEL_FLAG ) select #STOREOUT_ID#, #STOREOUT_NO#, BILL_TYPE, FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_ID, FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_NO, STOREOUT_STORE_ID, STOREOUT_STORE_NO, STOREOUT_STORE_NAME, BUSS_PSON_ID, BUSS_PSON_NAME, REMARK, #CREATOR#, #CRE_NAME#, sysdate, #DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME#, #STATE#, #DEL_FLAG# from DRP_FEW_STOREOUT_REQ where FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_ID = #FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_ID#

insert into DRP_STOREOUT_DTL( STOREOUT_DTL_ID, STOREOUT_ID, PRD_ID, PRD_NO, PRD_NAME, PRD_SPEC, BRAND, STD_UNIT, NOTICE_NUM, REMARK, DEL_FLAG, FROM_BILL_DTL_ID, SPCL_TECH_ID) select RAWTOHEX(SYS_GUID()) AS UUID, #STOREOUT_ID#, PRD_ID, PRD_NO, PRD_NAME, PRD_SPEC, BRAND, STD_UNIT, NOTICE_NUM, REMARK, #DEL_FLAG#, FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_DTL_ID, SPCL_TECH_ID from DRP_FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_DTL where FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_ID = #FEW_STOREOUT_REQ_ID# and DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG#
